Input: A way to register amy allergies.
So that restaurants know my allergies and can act acordingly.
I would like that the app would notify me on what allergies are contained in the dishes I order.
I sometimes per mistake order a dish with something I am mildly allergic off and this way I would know this.
I want to be able to search for a certain dish.
I now have to check te dishes of mutiple restaurants to find what I am looking for which takes a lot of time.
An option to pay more for a rush order.
I have little time to wait for my food so I would pay extra to get it quicker.
Old input: Ordering takes sometimes longer then expected and I have little time to eat.

Input: Add a function where I select favourite restaurants.
It takes a lot of time finding the same restaurants I always use.
